name: podbean-roam
description: A chrome extension to more easily support hosting roams via PodBean
author: Erik Brinkman <erik.brinkman@gmail.com>

scripts.format: prettier --write manifest.base.json package.json tsconfig.json rollup.config.js manifest.ts .eslintrc.json style.css 'src/**/*.{ts,tsx}'
scripts.prod: tsc && rollup -c | terser -c -o index.js && node manifest.js && zip podbean-roam.zip manifest.json index.js style.css img/rom_*.png
